FindAccountPageComponent.HEADLINE: Set up your login for listening on the SXM App.

FindAccountPageComponent.ALREADY_HAVE_LOGIN: Already have a login to stream?

AccountNotFoundPageComponent.HEADLINE: Looks like you may be new to SiriusXM.
AccountNotFoundPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS:
We canâ€™t find an existing subscription associated with your info. If you have SiriusXM in your vehicle, we can use your radio ID to look for one.

You can also explore our content and subscription options.

RadioIdPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS_TEXT: If you don't have a SiriusXM car radio, or you're only interested in streaming, you can try out the SXM App for free or subscribe to a streaming-only plan.
